overview:
Jason Snell is SVP/Editorial Director at IDG Consumer & SMB, overseeing all editorial operations for the company that publishes PCWorld, Macworld, and TechHive.

He was previously editor in chief of Macworld for seven years. He’s covered every major Apple product launch of the past decade.

He’s been writing about technology for nearly 20 years. He is also the host of the award-winning Incomparable podcast on the 5by5.tv network.
